root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-4-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.4 Assist developing countries in securing long-term debt sustainability through concerted policies to promote debt financing, debt relief or restructuring, as appropriate, and reduce debt distress by addressing the debt problem. external debt of heavily indebted poor countries17.4.1 Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMBank of the Republic of Burundi (BRB)NIZIGIYIMANA FerdinandStatistical serviceSDG focal point within the BRB61260969fnizigiyimana@yahoo.frExternal debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services%The Bank of the Republic of Burundi, financial databaseAdministrative dataannualannualBRB / ISTEEBUThe BRB is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelThe BRB is the body recognized by the Burundian governmentThis indicator is relevant.External debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and servicesannualAvailable nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level2017
